title: What are good gifts for a bridal shower? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually, weddings don’t kick start without the bridal shower party. Family and friends organize a beautiful evening for the bride to enjoy. It is one of those happy occasions where brides get a lot of gifts. Normally BFFs take responsibility for everything related to a bridal shower. Here we are going to be your helping hand in deciding the perfect gift for the bride on her bridal shower. 1. Earrings Earrings always make a beautiful bridal shower gift. Check out the Bulgari “Forever” collection which is inspired by the four petal flower motif. You can pick the earring pair from the collection and present it to the bride. Nothing will surprise her more than this. 2. A set of crystal vases Crystal never gets out of fashion when it comes to décor of your home. You can easily find many beautiful crystal pieces at very reasonable prices still looking like a lavish gift. 3. Travel Jewelry Kit Travel Jewelry Kit is perfect and the most useful bridal shower gift as it is the most needed honeymoon accessory. You can check Versace collection for that matter. Pick the one that is perfect in every aspect.

As a maid of honor, I just held a bridal shower for my best friend. I tried to make it easy on the guests by having a kitchen theme/gift focus and by getting the bride to set up her registries and at least add some kitchen items to them so guests could start there. If you don't have a theme or registry to go by, I would suggest thinking about the bride's tastes and needs. Will she be moving to a new place after the wedding? Is she trying to build up her kitchen, housewares, etc.? The gift certainly doesn't have to be as expensive as a wedding gift, but try to think about it being more personal and fitting the style of the bride. Some ideas:- recipe box- small appliance- bar gift set for cocktails- monogrammed towels, dishtowels, etc. Another nice idea if you already know what you're giving them for the wedding is to give a shower gift that hints or complements that (napkin rings for nice napkins, nice measuring or mixing tools for a mixing bowl set).
